title: Open window
creator_credit: Pyramid Films, American Film Institute and Richard Patterson
brief_description: Based on a story by Saki. Frampton Nuttle is a nervous, irresolute character. He retreats from closing a draughty window when Vera appears, twitches and trembles as she tells of the death of uncles, and retreats at the sight of these supposedly dead men suddenly arriving through open windows. Cast includes Britt Leach, Cindy Eilbacher, Mary Wicks, Roslie Williams, Alan Caillou, William Beckley. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
